meanings.definition: Make a loud, unpleasant, and prolonged noise.
meanings.sent1: The construction workers were dinning with their hammers and drills.
meanings.sent2: The thunderstorm was dinning outside all night long.
meanings.sent3: The noisy parrot kept dinning in the background during the phone call.
meanings.sent4: The alarm clock dinning in the morning was like a persistent wake-up call.
meanings.sent5: The firecrackers dinning in the distance added to the festive atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Repeat a statement or idea frequently to someone.
meanings.sent1: She kept dinning her request for a raise to her boss.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was dinning the importance of studying for the upcoming test.
meanings.sent3: The children were dinning their favorite song lyrics all day long.
meanings.sent4: The politician dinning promises during the campaign trail.
meanings.sent5: The coach kept dinning the team's strategy for winning the game.

meanings.definition: A loud, unpleasant, and prolonged noise.
meanings.sent1: The dinning of the traffic outside made it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent2: The constant dinning of the construction site was bothersome to the neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The dinning of the wind through the trees created a spooky atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The dinning of the crowd at the concert was overwhelming but exciting.
meanings.sent5: The dinning of the thunder echoed through the valley.
